pages.text: wa-in yamsaska l-lahu bidurrin fala kashifa lahu illa huwa wa-in yurid'ka bikhayrin fala radda lifadlihi yusibu bihi man yashau min ʿibadihi wahuwa l-ghafuru l-rahimu
qul yaayyuha l-nasu qad jaakumu l-haqu min rabbikum famani ih'tada fa-innama yahtadi linafsihi waman dalla fa-innama yadillu ʿalayha wama ana ʿalaykum biwakilin
wa-ittabiʿ ma yuha ilayka wa-is'bir hatta yahkuma l-lahu wahuwa khayru l-hakimina
alif-lam-ra kitabun uh'kimat ayatuhu thumma fussilat min ladun hakimin khabirin
alla taʿbudu illa l-laha innani lakum min'hu nadhirun wabashirun
wa-ani is'taghfiru rabbakum thumma tubu ilayhi yumattiʿ'kum mataʿan hasanan ila ajalin musamman wayu'ti kulla dhi fadlin fadlahu wa-in tawallaw fa-inni akhafu ʿalaykum ʿadhaba yawmin kabirin
ila l-lahi marjiʿukum wahuwa ʿala kulli shayin qadirun
ala innahum yathnuna sudurahum liyastakhfu min'hu ala hina yastaghshuna thiyabahum yaʿlamu ma yusirruna wama yuʿ'linuna innahu ʿalimun bidhati l-suduri
